usefulItems: large freezable container with lid (approx. 9 in. x 13 in.), freezer
title: Pumpkin Ice Cream

preparations.content: <b>Insert butterfly whisk.<b> Place cream into mixing bowl and without measuring cup whip <b>speed 3<b> until desired stiffness is achieved, watching carefully to avoid overwhipping (approx. 2-3 min).
Add condensed milk, pumpkin purée, vanilla and pumpkin spice mix and mix <b>5 sec/speed 2<b>. <b>Remove butterfly whisk<b>, gently fold in any unmixed batter with spatula until fully combined.
Transfer to a freezable container with lid and freeze 10 hours or overnight until completely frozen.
Remove ice cream from freezer 10-15 minutes before serving.
